content: materials - 2 4 skeins of purl soho s note 1 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% baby alpaca each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 200 yards/ 100 grams approximately 310 725 total yards required we used the colors fresh fig and purple heath - us 5 3 75 mm 16- or 40-inch circular knitting needles 2 depending on size you are making - a stitch marker 3 gauge 22 stitches and 34 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes once-around twice-around finished dimensions 12¼ inches high x 21¾ 51¾ inches circumference sample we knit the once-around version pattern designed and written by purl soho designer gianna mueller 4 see even more of gianna s work on her instagram 5 1 https //www purlsoho com/note html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
